availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Allen A. Cherry (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret T. Wilkes Cherry in Warren County, Kentucky, on July 7, 1831. Father of Elizabeth Cherry Clarkson, John Cherry, Columbus Cherry, William H. Cherry, Samuel Cherry, Richardson Cherry, Mary A. Cherry, Reuben W. Cherry, and Sarah M. Cherry. Farmer in Warren County in 1850. Farmer in Warren County in 1860. Justice of the Peace in Warren County in 1861.

ab.bibl:

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339890, p. 40.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339890, p. 5.
